# Templates

Minimal structural templates used across the repository.
They are intentionally short and are referenced by folder READMEs.

## Templates in this folder
- `journal-template.md` → used by `docs/journal/`
- `concept-template.md` → used by `docs/concepts/`
- `proof-template.md` → used by `proofs/**`
- `retrospective-template.md` → used by `docs/retrospectives/`

## Rule
Templates define **structure**, not guidance.
Guidance lives in the relevant folder `README.md`.

---

## Türkçe

Bu klasörde repo genelinde kullanılan minimal şablonlar bulunur.

Kural:
Template “format” verir; “nasıl/niye” anlatımı README’lerdedir.s
